reviews.review: Н-ностальгия
Fun to play as a CSGO fanatic

I mean, due to the existence of CS:GO this game is mostly just bought for the models it adds to Garry's mod. Still, the time I played it was decent enough, but if you're looking to buy this one to play it? Just buy CS:GO, you'll be happier with that.
better than cs go but still shit

This game is literally the reason why I built a PC in the first place. The very first time I ever played this game was back in 2009 when I was at a friends house. I was so used to playing Call of Duty and Halo games on the X-Box 360 and had never seen a game that used the mechanics and gamestyle as Counter Strike so I gave it a shot and tried it. I've never fallen in love with a game so quickly. I would always go over to my friends house to play this game every chance I got and probably locked around 100 hours on the game before I even got a PC and made a Steam account. As soon as I made a Steam account in 2011, this is the first game I bought. I quickly locked another 100 hours within the first month of getting it on my account and continued to play it then on. As of 2011 I've fallen in love with the Counter Strike franchise and have been playing the games ever since. This game especially will certainly be something I remember for quite far into my life.

Pues a este juego le he llegado a coger más cariño que al original (1.6) y es porque aunque sea lo mismo. Me resulta más atractivo de jugar a día de hoy. Gráficos diría que decentes e incluso si tienes un ordenador de baja gama pues te lo puedes permitir. La interfaz es similar pero se hace más cómoda. Tiene muchos modos de juegos (en servidores comunitarios encontrarás diferentes modos) como siempre ha sido en counter. Bastante divertido y este si es un sucesor a diferencia de condition zero
